import React, { useState } from "react"; const UserMenu: React.FC = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); return (
setOpen(!open)} style={{ display: "flex", alignItems: "center", cursor: "pointer", gap: "8px", }} >
{open && (
(e.currentTarget.style.color = "#0067A3")} onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.currentTarget.style.color = "#000")} > Profile
(e.currentTarget.style.color = "#0067A3")} onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.currentTarget.style.color = "#000")} > Log out
)}
); }; export default UserMenu;
